title: I don't always pick Akali
body:
But when I do I have to put in 5x as much work as any other Champion for 100% of the game and still end up dying to do my job then they just spam pink wards and my engage consists of Q-R'ing a Tank then hitting E and Zhonya'sing then flashing to and killing the carry before I die to a landslide of unhappy enemies.

Like this is a best case scenario for carrying with Akali and there is no reward for playing her and even when you do your job and in the best of scenarios - you still end up being a Kamikaze pilot (real world reference) and all-in-all she is the least rewarding semi-viable Champion and in her best case scenarios puts in 100% work for 100% of the game and even then if fed is still a 70% power level Champion and when worst comes to worse she is unplayable.

Farming is a nightmare, coming up with that 1200g for a Hextech Revolver is an epic slug fest mission of outplays and hard work and then even once she has it her power spike is that of a Teemo lvl 1 purchasing a dagger before he walks to lane and her itemisation after that is a mix-fest of "what is actually viable" and it turns out she has almost no synergy in her builds from items and literally has to power spike with Zhonya's and Gunblade then heavily snowball the game in her favor or her carry potential is null and void and the best she can do is attempt to clean up in fights and still cops executes etc and shutdowns and for a Champion that is technically a snowball/snowballs off killing - she is ridiculously easy to shut down and it has to be like a 10 minute GG by her or there have to be several favourable team fights due against poor enemy scaling and similarly scaled allies or you can't win.

replies.body:
52.3% win rate top laner, in plat and above.

Also you clearly don't know how to akali by this

>my engage consists of Q-R'ing a Tank then hitting E and Zhonya'sing

Even if you engage some1 else the outcome is the same, in fact going on their backline its worse.

Her sustain and damage got gutted so hard she has to take Zhonyas 9 times out of 10 and she has to Zhonyas after a flash R-Q-R, she has no hope in hell of getting to a carry without flash and even if she does engage on a frontlining Ahri still has to Zhonyas and in the best case scenarios of killing a carry she still dies anyway 9 times out of ten.

Other Champs can walk away or escape, like Zed etc. Talon can W and Run and has an ulti to initiate with and can conserve flash but her R range is CRAP and her entire kit is crap, Zed just ults and shadows out, Ahri dashes and dashes, Talon can initiate better and Riot wonder why Akali is a joke Champion I mean come on.

Look at the mechanisms of assassination and she is designed for being on the winning team and otherwise is the poorest assassin out of all of them because of her "in the fray" and "no way out" design.
Spiking her damage and push and clear with Rageblade might seem useful but she still suffers the same design flaws Riot gave her by shredding her ranges and damage and sustain and resistances.

People who have higher ratings than you play akali, and play her much more effectively, and do pretty much none of the things that you say are required.

Akali is also someone who excels in roaming midgame, not a lategame teamfighter unless you can kill an out of position carry. Assassins are not supposed to initiate fights, talon doesn't initiate a teamfight, Ahri can with charm picks, but she's not really an assassin anymore, and much closer to a kite mage. Zed is trash in teamfights lategame as well. Akali's R range is "shit" because she has three of them"

In fact very few assassins actually have a way out mechanic EXCEPT zed and LB. EG Nocturne can't leave once he's in, Kat can only leave IF she gets the kill, Rengar isn't leaving anytime soon, Kha only gets out if he gets the kill, Eve only gets her speed boost back if she gets the kill, Ekko can leave, but needs to use his ulti to do so, and only has four seconds to get out or he's fucked.

Meanwhile you dash wrongly you have tools like shroud to run back out at superspeed, or ward over a wall and dash to a jungle creep or minion wave. There is nothing wrong with the champion, you're just bad at her.

Kha has 2-3 Invis's with movespeed to get into and out of the fray repeatedly and you are dead wrong.

Akali's "way out" mechanics are trash and verse decent players she is trash.

You can argue that in solo queue she does OK or reference a few high elo players with success with her, but fact is if she's not a counter-pick or picked into a certain comp she's trash and unlike other Assassins who are a semi-safe first pick or early pick and don't need to be picked around to the same extent - she's does.

She will never see play at worlds in her current state and she is a joke Champion.

Also you're making it personal and half of what you stated is wrong btw, IE Zed is trash in team fights (This is where he does his job best and excels IE go watch a faker video) also that Ahri's not really an Assassin anymore and she is an Assassin now more than ever and Akali's R range isn't sh-t because she has 3 of them, it's because she deleted carries and got away with it so Riot nerfed her into the ground to compensate for sooking carries who whinged about no counterplay because they didn't know what pink wards were and now they get a free Trinket to reveal her and it's time Riot reverted the changes.

She was a noob stomp Champion and Riot went and nerfed her for the noobs. GG wp.

Also your point about Talon was null and Void.

Akali's R range is terrible for a Champion with her Kit.

Too often you need to flash.

Btw Ekko has a massive Shield and can ulti whilst still in a fight for a substantial heal and massive AOE damage.

His entire Kit is broken which is why he's played as a Jungler (still) and Akali is a joke tier laughable pick and if someone picked her at worlds 1st pick I would laugh all the way to the defeat banner for that team and in almost any comp if they took her as a later pick would be literally lol'ing.

You claim Ekko is broken but he has a lower winrate than akali.

Akali also still noobstomps, its just noobs can't play her to noobstomp anymore.

How is my point about talon null and void, you said he can initiate, he can't initate unless you're silver as fuck and LET him.
She might be better this season but she's still Trash Tier.

2- why are you engaging a tank? Wtf
